text: The 2018–19 season of Atlético Petróleos de Luanda is the club's 38th season in the Girabola, the Angolan Premier football League and 38th consecutive season in the top flight of Angolan football. In 2019, the club is participating in the Girabola, the Angola Cup and the CAF Confederation Cup. == Squad information == === Players === {| class="wikitable ve-ce-branchNode ve-ce-tableNode" !No. !Nat !Nick !Name !Pos !Date of Birth (Age) |- !
